publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3673 Alex Neil: Anniversary of Finland’s Independence—That the Parliament sends its cordial best wishes to Finland which celebrates its 88th year of independence from Russia on 6 December 2005; notes that this independent country is able to celebrate its national day with a public holiday; congratulates the country for the massive improvements it has made to public health, and looks forward to the day that Scotland can also celebrate its independence and has the powers of a proper parliament to tackle adequately poverty and poor health.

S2M-3673 Anniversary of Finland’s Independence (lodged on 6 December 2005) Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Jim Mather*, Tricia Marwick*, Campbell Martin*, Richard Lochhead*, Christine Grahame*, Rob Gibson*, Bruce Crawford*, Brian Adam*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr John Swinney*, Shiona Baird*, Margo MacDonald*
S2M-3673 Anniversary of Finland’s Independence (lodged on 6 December 2005) Michael Matheson*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Fiona Hyslop*

S2M-3673 Alex Neil: Anniversary of Finland’s Independence—That the Parliament sends its cordial best wishes to Finland which celebrates its 88th year of independence from Russia on 6 December 2005; notes that this independent country is able to celebrate its national day with a public holiday; congratulates the country for the massive improvements it has made to public health, and looks forward to the day that Scotland can also celebrate its independence and has the powers of a proper parliament to tackle adequately poverty and poor health. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Mr Bruce McFee, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Jim Mather, Tricia Marwick, Campbell Martin, Richard Lochhead, Christine Grahame, Rob Gibson, Bruce Crawford, Brian Adam, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr John Swinney, Shiona Baird, Margo MacDonald, Michael Matheson, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Fiona Hyslop, Linda Fabiani*
